name: Crymora
description: A mysterious fairy with crystal wings tainted by dark magic. Its icy heart grants it powerful special abilities while wielding forbidden spells.

ability.name: Dark Frost
ability.description: Dark and Ice moves gain 25% power. Special Attack increases by one stage when hit by a Dark move.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: A powerful ice beam that may freeze the target.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: Hurls a shadowy blob. May lower special defense.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Attacks with moonlight. May lower special attack.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: Releases a horrible aura. May cause flinching.

habitat: Frozen temples and cursed ice caves
